tCalFactors Struct Reference
[Sensor Application]

#include <sensors.h>

Detailed Description

Calibration data, stored in EEPROM.

To calculate measured data, the following formula is used:

   reading = m * ADC + b

Definition at line 176 of file sensors.h.


Data Fields

double m
 The slope of the reading versus ADC input.
double b
 The offset of the reading.
